review_title: Best culture to ever be in!
pros:
- Chill, open, and free culture
- Welcoming to feedback and criticism to the organisational system
- Freedomful!
cons: - Company is now in huge growth spur. Might be hard to acclimatise to the quick changes!

pros: Organisation of staff, ensuring employee happiness, workload etc.

review_title: Reduction of Motivation after a while...
pros:
- Competitive salary
- Modern technology stack
- Smart people
cons:
- Colleague unresponsive to work related requests and access (could take days to weeks to get access and review of pull requests)
- When meeting invite is send to colleague and some colleagues, colleague accepts meeting invite but does not attend meeting, had to wait 10-15 mins but no response
- Not the slightest idea of on-boarding engineers, some engineers could spend 1-3 months not knowing which product/engineering team they are being assigned
- Directionless and no structure in engineering career and work
- I don't see or feel any action after submitting internal feedback survey on the company
- Not remote or work from home friendly environment

pros:
CEO and CTO are known to be humble, yet being on top of their jobs and knowing whats happening on the ground. They engaged thoroughly with employees and drive the culture top-down of "doing things right". 

New office is fantastic, bright and has positive vibes. The office admin is very friendly and pantry drinks are ever well stocked. Reporting structures are flat and it is easy to liaise with other departments for work chats as we're all in the same mindset - driving the company to greater highs.
cons: Cons is more of an industry-trait rather than Coinhako itself. Crypto is fast moving and the challenges are ever evolving. There isnt an in-between and you either love it or hate it. Suggest that candidates join the industry only if they love it, the passion will help to push through tough times.

review_title: One of the best company I've ever worked in.
pros: Both Yusho and Gerry are the nicest reporting managers/leaders that I've ever come across. Well versed in the crypto space and empower their people by listening. You will be in good hands and feeling positive with a bunch of great colleagues.
cons: Not that I can remember of.

pros: great people, great management, fast pace and agile
cons: cat was too cute. hard to focus at work
